description: Public Works Government Services Canada (PWGSC), on behalf of its client, Real Property Services Branch has a requirement to establish up to two (2) Standing Offers in accordance with the requirement.  This requirement is for the supply, delivery and installation of office seating, on an as-and-when requested basis, within the National Capital Region.  AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and Buyandsell posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted on January 20, 2023 by 2:00pm EST. All bids submitted after 2:00pm EST will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.  The full Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) and attachments can only be accessed and downloaded when logged into your SAP Ariba account.

**Request Details**
-------------------
The Department of Public Works and Government Services Canada, on behalf of its client, the Real Property Services Branch, invites vendors to submit their bids to establish up to two (2) Standing Offers for the supply, delivery, and installation of office seating within the National Capital Region.

**Procurement Details**
----------------------- 
* Specification Category | Office Seating 
* Expected Start Date | January 31, 2023
* Expected End Date | March 31, 2024
* Regions of Delivery | National Capital Region

**Selection Criteria**
---------------------
Bids will be evaluated based on the lowest price.

**Required Documents**
------------------------
Interested vendors can access the full Request for Standing Offer and attachments through their SAP Ariba account.

**Contact Information**
-----------------------

Michelle Wong (SPAC/PSPC)
Mail: michelle.wong@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
